original_text:
Why does the wicked man revile God?
    Why does he say to himself,
    “He won’t call me to account”?
korean_text: 어찌하여 악인이 하나님을 멸시하여 그의 마음에 이르기를 주는 감찰하지 아니하리라 하나이까

sentences.original_text: Why does the wicked man revile God?
Why does he say to himself,
He won't call me to account?
